name: Liebestod
description:
Liebestod is a mediation game for the Opera orchestra of Montpellier.

PITCH

You play as Isolde who wants to join his beloved, tristan in his "liebestod ", his death of love.

More information:

https://artfx.school/game-jam-opera/

CREDITS

Game Design & Programming: 

Eddy Alain NJIKI.T

2D illustrator: 

Benjamin CHE BA

CONTROL

- Left and Right

- Escape to quit

Install instructions

1 - Unzip the folder

3 - Launch "Liebestod.exe"

4 - Enjoy!
